Title: Object: Nicolas Poussin
Series: Portraits of Celebrated Painters
Description: Portrait of French painter Nicolas Poussin, after the artist's self portrait; half-length, turned to left, with pencil holder in right hand and left hand resting on book; below, a small scene representing the Return from the Flight into Egypt. 1816 Etching
Producer name: Published by: Lackington & Co (Lackington, Allen & Co)
Curator's comments: For comment on series see 1914,0810.8. After a portrait executed in 1649 and now at the Staatliche Museen, Berlin.
